argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrhval.l | |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` R ) = ( .g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` R ) ( 1r ` R ) ) ) = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` R ) ( 1r ` R ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_mulgrhm2 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ZZring RingHom R ) = { ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` R ) ( 1r ` R ) ) ) } ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 4 | #P_zrhval2 | |- ( R e. Ring -> L = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` R ) ( 1r ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_sneqd | |- ( R e. Ring -> { L } = { ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` R ) ( 1r ` R ) ) ) } ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ZZring RingHom R ) = { L } ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( F e. ( ZZring RingHom R ) <-> F e. { L } ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ZRHom ` R ) e. _V |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_eqeltri | |- L e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_elsnc2 | |- ( F e. { L } <-> F = L ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( F e. ( ZZring RingHom R ) <-> F = L ) ) |
